title: The Brave Tin Soldier
description: The flames lighted up the tin soldier, as he stood, the heat was very terrible, but whether it proceeded from the real fire or from the fire of love he could not tell.(from The Brave Tin Soldier)Hans Christian Andersen's literary classic tale with digitally remastered illustrations by the golden age artists[Featuring Arthur Rackham, H. J. Ford, Harry Clarke, Kay Nielsen, Mabel Lucie Attwell, Maxwell Armfield, Milo Winter, Monro S. Orr, and more.]Hans Christian Andersen will take you back to your childhood.
author: Hans Christian Andersen
